```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```


```{r}
malaria <- read_csv('data/malaria.csv')
```
```{r}
malaria <- clean_names(malaria)
```


```{r}
malaria_tidy <- malaria %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("malaria_rdt"),
               names_to = "age_class",
               values_to = "cases") %>% 
  select(data_date,submitted_date,location_name,district,age_class)
```

```{r}
malaria_tidy %>% 
  filter(data_date=="2020-0730") %>% 
  group_by(district) %>% 
  
```
